message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your starting point is a bit too much in your favor. How about we meet closer to the middle?
I can go a bit lower, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or the next one will be much less in your favor.
You're bluffing, I think you want to end this game as much as I do.
